channel.title: Is it possible? If so, how?
channel.description:
Hey, is it possible to make an object request a code? Or a password, to get through?..
Example.
When i click a door, it will say like..
You must now enter the password to go through!
Then, on trades, you know how you right click an item, and click amount (X)..
Well you can type numbers in there right?.. I was thinking something like that..
Can someone show me how this would be done :S?

item.title: Is it possible? If so, how?
item.dc:creator: @X-J-K-X X-J-K-X
item.description:
@X-J-K-X wrote:

Can you give me an example on how to do it?.. Also how to set the password?..

Read full topic

item.title: Is it possible? If so, how?
item.dc:creator: @X-J-K-X X-J-K-X
item.description:
@X-J-K-X wrote:

[quote=“Waffles!!, post:2, topic:156929”]Hmmm…I have an idea, gimme a sec to type.

Here:

Use a boolean. A command(the password) to make a boolean false.

boolean pass = false;

if(command.startsWith("PASSWORD") && pass == false) { pass = true; sendMessage("You have guessed the password!"); } else if(pass == true) { sendMessage("You already know the password!"); }

case ID: if(pass == true) { teleportToX = #; //X coord inside the room teleportToY = #; //Y coord inside the room } else if(pass == false) { sendMessage("You must say the magic password!"); } break;

Quickly typed, but possible, with some fixes.[/quote]

Have already done that :P…

Look at this.

Thats what i mean. You enter an amount, hit enter, and bam, you get telied.

Read full topic

item.title: Is it possible? If so, how?
item.dc:creator: @Waffles1 Waffles!!
item.description:
@Waffles1 wrote:

Hmmm…I have an idea, gimme a sec to type.

Here:

Use a boolean. A command(the password) to make a boolean false.

boolean pass = false;

if(command.startsWith("PASSWORD") && pass == false) { pass = true; sendMessage("You have guessed the password!"); } else if(pass == true) { sendMessage("You already know the password!"); }

case ID: if(pass == true) { teleportToX = #; //X coord inside the room teleportToY = #; //Y coord inside the room } else if(pass == false) { sendMessage("You must say the magic password!"); } break;

Quickly typed, but possible, with some fixes.

Read full topic
